name: zk-kyc-circuits
description: ZK circuits for privacy-preserving KYC verification

scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup build/kyc.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_14.ptau build/kyc_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute: snarkjs zkey contribute build/kyc_0000.zkey build/kyc_final.zkey --name='ZK Invoice Contribution'
scripts.export-vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/kyc_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.build-all: npm run compile && npm run setup && npm run contribute && npm run export-vkey && npm run export-verifier
